welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming North Grenville, Canada! Get ready to experience the natural beauty, friendly locals, and rich history that this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that North Grenville has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Smith Falls Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ogdensburg Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ogdensburg Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport, primarily used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Simply select the network and accept the terms and conditions to connect.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brockville Airport handles all commercial flights and passenger services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Brockville Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
